original_text: He will hear things that frighten him. He may think that he is safe, but robbers will attack him. He will hear things that frighten him.
korean_text: 그의 귀에는 무서운 소리가 들리고 그가 평안할 때에 멸망시키는 자가 그에게 이르리니

sentences.original_text: He will hear things that frighten him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 무서워하게 만드는 것들을 들을 것이다

sentences.original_text: He may think that he is safe
He will hear things that frighten him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 무서워하게 만드는 것들을 들을 것이다
